comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: While I like the idea of an auction that is timed out when a certain block is reached, it's unfortnatelly quite unpractical. Some auctions might end in the middle of the night or take much longer than expected etc.That said, cool artworks. Took me a little to probably fully get your comic sequence.Fight Day has a touch of Bitcoin soft-porn. Haven't seen too much in that regard so far, lol.So starting bid is just 1 sat? How much is EU shipping and how much for US (to MJ) shipping?Let's start this off:Pizza Day 2023 - Nr. 3/10 Â 0.00000255Fight Day - Nr. 2/10 Â  Â  Â  Â  0.00006969Oh and one last point, your photos look great but one just fully displaying the card without the need to turn your head 90 degrees to the screen would be cool.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Sometimes, the Bitcoin block train might arrive a bit later than expected. This could add an interesting twist to the game, like a surprise element. I'm curious to see how it works out.Both postcards are being auctioned as a bundle, so you get them together. The soft porn postcard is the very last one, and unfortunately, I don't have any more left.Shipping is free within the EU and US (including MJ).P.S. I've made new images, and I appreciate the helpful tip.

Your stuff looks really good. Keep it up, and maybe another auction.Need to find a convenient app or tool to notify if a certain block-height is hit, though. Anyone got a suggestion?
